qryUnitBillingBatchHeader_Create: SELECT top  [BatchSize] hsl_expenditure_batch_name ExpenditureBatch, hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_headerid IntegrationBatchHeaderId FROM  dbo.hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_header Where hsl_oracle_batch_status in ('In Process','Approved')  order by hsl_expenditure_batch_name
qryUnitBillingGetList_Create: SELECT hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_detailedrecordid DetailRecordId, hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_headerid IntegrationBatchHeaderId, H.hsl_batch_hdrid, d.hsl_param_proj_to_bill, d.hsl_param_quantity,  d.hsl_param_subtask_to_bill,  d.hsl_param_unit_to_bill,  d.hsl_param_we_date,  d.hsl_param_wono_to_bill,  h.hsl_oracle_batch_status, h.hsl_expenditure_batch_name ExpenditureBatch,  d.hsl_business_unit BusinessUnit,  'Units and Equip' TransactionSource,  'Units and Equip' Document,  'Units and Equip' DocumentEntry, d.hsl_api_nlr_id NonlaborResourceID,  d.hsl_fbdi_nonlabor_resource NonlaborResource,  d.hsl_fbdi_nonlabor_resource_organization NonlaborResourceOrganization, 'USD' TransactionCurrencyCode,  d.hsl_param_quantity Quantity,  d.hsl_rs_unit_of_measure UnitOfMeasure,  d.hsl_fbdi_expenditure_date EXPENDITURE_ITEM_DATE, d.hsl_api_proj_id PROJECT_ID,  d.hsl_api_task_id TASK_ID,  d.hsl_fbdi_expenditure_type EXPENDITURE_TYPE_ID_Display,  d.hsl_fbdi_expenditure_organization ORGANIZATION_ID_Display FROM  dbo.hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_header H join [dbo].[hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_detailedrecord] D on  H.hsl_batch_hdrid = d.hsl_batch_hdr_id WHERE h.hsl_expenditure_batch_name=@BatchName and isnull(hsl_oracle_status,'')!='Sent to UPC' order by h.createdon, hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_headerid
qryUnitBillingBatchHeader_Update: SELECT top  [BatchSize] hsl_expenditure_batch_name ExpenditureBatch, hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_headerid IntegrationBatchHeaderId FROM  dbo.hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_header Where hsl_oracle_batch_status in ('In Process','Sent to UPC') order by hsl_expenditure_batch_name
qryUnitBillingGetList_Update: SELECT hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_detailedrecordid DetailRecordId , h.createdon, hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_headerid From  dbo.hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_header H join [dbo].[hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_detailedrecord] D on  H.hsl_batch_hdrid = d.hsl_batch_hdr_id WHERE h.hsl_expenditure_batch_name=@BatchName  and ( isnull(hsl_oracle_status,'')!='Success' or hsl_ppm_pc_transaction_id is null) order by h.createdon, hsl_oracleintegrationbatch_headerid
